Function reference

Feature Selection Steps

step_select_background() tidy(<step_select_background>)
Feature selection step using background level
step_select_cv() tidy(<step_select_cv>)
Feature selection step using the coefficient of variation
step_select_wilcoxon() tidy(<step_select_wilcoxon>)
Feature selection step using Wilcoxon test
step_select_kruskal() tidy(<step_select_kruskal>)
Feature selection step using Kruskal test

Feature Aggregation Steps

step_aggregate_list() tidy(<step_aggregate_list>)
Feature aggregation step based on a defined list
step_aggregate_hclust() tidy(<step_aggregate_hclust>)
Feature aggregation step based on a hierarchical clustering

Feature Normalization Steps

step_rownormalize_tss() tidy(<step_rownormalize_tss>)
Feature normalization step using total sum scaling

Datasets

pedcan_expression
Gene Expression of Pediatric Cancer
cheese_abundance cheese_taxonomy
Abundance of Fungal Communities in Cheese

Helpers

cv()
Coefficient of variation
var_to_keep()
Decide which variable to keep
